name: FIST! Of the Yard
description:
The year is 2042. Britain is in Turmoil as it is assaulted by gangs of Anarco-liberal Crypto Facists

Scotland Yard has commissioned the creation of a new breed of super-cop to combat the threat.

The result is Chief Inspector FIST of the Yard...

Controls:
A/D or Arrows: Move

SPACE: Jump, Wall Jump and Hover

Z/X/C: FIST
